data.title: Dr. Adrian Nedelcu
data.meta_description: SciProfiles provides open access to the scholarly community, offering comprehensive profiles where researchers can highlight their academic life, contributions, and share ideas freely. Most likely shall be updated again when we have the content strategy.
data.text:
Adrian Nedelcu - lecturer at the Department of Business Administration, Faculty of Economic Sciences, Petroleum-Gas University of Ploiești. He was awarded his Ph.D by the University of Bucharest in the field of Geography (2000). He is involved in research activities in different areas such as regional analyses and development, urban and rural development, economical geography and, due to his passion for these fields, he has participated in over 20 international conferences and workshops, has written over 10 scientific books on his own or in collaboration with his colleagues (volumes, course notes, handbooks, tourist guides), over 50 scientific articles and 8 maps. He is one of the coordinators of the volume published in 2016 by the Romanian Academy Publishing House entitled Prahova County - space, society, economy, environment and the sole author of Tourism Geography (2015). Since 2018, he is editor-in-chief of the Central European Journal of Geography and Sustainable Development.

He is one of the coordinators of the volume published in 2016 by the Romanian Academy Publishing House entitled Prahova County - space, society, economy, environment and the sole author of Tourism Geography (2015). Since 2018, he is editor-in-chief of the Central European Journal of Geography and Sustainable Development.
